Texts.Chs:
Subterranean dwelling, Antlion-like mining warrior species that live in ashlands and deserts. They are strong and fairly heat resistant.

  ^orange;食性^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;天赋^reset;:
  HPx^green;1.1^reset;
  Defense x^green;1.05^reset;
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^green;25^reset;% Fire
  ^cyan;免疫^reset;: Burning, Sandstorms, Quicksand, Jungle Dirt and Silt

^orange;环境^reset;:
  ^green;Desert, Red Desert, Volcanic Primeval and Volcanic^reset; biomes: +^green;10^reset;% 速度

^orange;武器^reset;:
  Broadsword +^green;20^reset;% 暴击伤害
  Hammer Defense x^green;1.10^reset;, +^green;20^reset;% 击退抗性ance
  Drill: 伤害 x^green;1.1^reset;,  能量x^green;1.1^reset;

^red;弱点^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;25^reset;% Ice, -^red;10^reset;% Electric
Texts.Eng:
Subterranean dwelling, Antlion-like mining warrior species that live in ashlands and deserts. They are strong and fairly heat resistant.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.1^reset;
  Defense x^green;1.05^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;25^reset;% Fire
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Burning, Sandstorms, Quicksand, Jungle Dirt and Silt

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Desert, Red Desert, Volcanic Primeval and Volcanic^reset; biomes: +^green;10^reset;% Speed

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Broadsword +^green;20^reset;% Crit Damage
  Hammer Defense x^green;1.10^reset;, +^green;20^reset;% Knockback Resistance
  Drill: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, Energy x^green;1.1^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;25^reset;% Ice, -^red;10^reset;% Electric
